member.name: CD3D11_BLEND_DESC.CD3D11_BLEND_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a structure that is initialized with default blend-state values.

member.name: CD3D11_BLEND_DESC.CD3D11_BLEND_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a structure that is initialized with a CD3D11_BLEND_DESC structure.
member.param: Address of the CD3D11_BLEND_DESC structure that initializes the CD3D11_BLEND_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_BLEND_DESC.CD3D11_BLEND_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized structure.

member.name: CD3D11_BLEND_DESC
member.summary: Represents a blend-state structure and provides convenience methods for creating blend-state structures.
